title: Land Sale - Udugampola, Gampaha
details:
17 & 20 perches 02 lands
Money Urgent Sale for a quick buyer
Gampaha - Udugampola (Doranagoda)

300 metres to Gampaha - Divulapitiya Main Rd
5 min. to Udugampola / 10 min. to Gampaha Town

Quiet environment with one side facing a paddy field
Respectful neighbourhood.
Valuable land

(1 perch - 1,25,000)
